intro: Rudgea marcano-bertii, commonly known as the Marcano-Bertii Rudgea, is a flowering plant native to specific regions in South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 12,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its slender, woody stems and clusters of small, white or pale yellow flowers.
